name: ai-pulse
description: AI-powered daily intelligence on model releases, benchmarks, and industry developments
author: LFX AI LLC <alex@lfxai.dev>

scripts.deploy:worker: cd worker && npx wrangler deploy --env production
scripts.deploy:dashboard: cd dashboard && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=ai-pulse
scripts.db:migrate: cd worker && npx wrangler d1 execute ai-pulse-db --file=../schema.sql --remote
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd worker && npm install && cd ../dashboard && npm install
